item.title: Strong start for earnings season creates support for Wall Street's record highs
item.description: Thus far, 83% of S&P 500 companies have beaten earnings expectations, according to FactSet's John Butters.

item.title: Play online gaming stock Genius Sports for a prospective breakout, says Carter Worth
item.description: Chart analyst Carter Worth sees the stock breaking out of a tight range.

item.title: Buy Chipotle Mexican Grill stock for 'best in class' value, says BMO Capital Markets
item.description: Shares have pulled back more than 11% so far in 2025.

item.title: These stocks reporting earnings next have a history of beating expectations
item.description: Companies reporting earnings next week with a history of beating expectations include Chipotle Mexican Grill.

item.title: Buy this streaming stock ahead of its earnings report later this month, says JPMorgan
item.description: JPMorgan reiterated an overweight rating on the streaming stock in a Friday note and raised its price target.
